page.title: 04ARMED FORCES
page.content: Although there are no Military Establishments in the area its inhabitants are very aware of the presence of neighbouring Military Bases across the Water. The American Polaris Missile servicing and stores base is situated in The Holy Loch.There are also two British Naval concerns in the area.The British Navy has a large complex at Coulport which is responsible the storage,maintenace and supply of arms for the Submarine Fleet.At Faslane on The Gare Loch there is the Submarine Base of the British Fleet.This paticular base has often been the Target of Anti nuclear Protest Groups.This concetration of military esablishments makes the whole area a Prime target area in the event of Nuclear Conflict.
